name: Not even your mom played this
name_original: Not even your mom played this
description:
Try to get your mom to play your game (maybe someone else too).

WASD to move. Use E to interact. Use your mouse to select options.

Use your computer when you're done with the day.

We've only tested the .exe for Windows.

We made this in 7 days for Brackey's Game Jam 5.
